1942 June 21 Tree of Liberty Sept 12 All this & Heaven too has read American Beauty Sept 12 This is my story July 7 My Life Isadora July 7 Seasoned Timber July 7 Action for Slander July 7 July 16 Tail of the Comet Sept 12 Those United States Jonah's Gourd Vine Sept 12 Backward Glance Sept 12 Sept 3 Benjamin Franklin x Rebellious Puritan x 1943 April 13 As I Lay Dying April 30 Sane <*> April 30 March ? Unforgotten Years returned July 8 May 1 Daring Young Man returned by K D May 19 Forbidden Journey x May 25 Grapes of Wrath May 18 Let your Mind Alone x May 25 King Coal 2 vols ---- May Golden Apples x June 30 Cradle of Life May 18 May 10 Coming Struggle for Latin America May 25
